title: uLLam urugi urugi anbu
sahitya:
uLLam urugi urugi anbu veLLam AgAdO paramA


anupallavi

  kaLLa maya kanavugaL inru kavalaigaLum ninaivugaL enru


caraNam    veNNiraviyAl aruviyAgum veLLip-paniyaippOlE vEgamAna minsArattin 
viLakku varisai pOlE kaLLum karuttum kalanda poruLE kanakAngita  jODi aruLE
